title: The Grey Eyed Storm:  The Occuli, Book One
description: **OFFICIAL FANTASY SELECTION - 2016 New Apple Book Awards for Excellence in Independent Publishing!!!**2016 Readers' Favorite BRONZE MEDAL WINNER for BEST FANTASY BOOK!!!**OFFICIAL FANTASY SELECTION - 2015 New Apple Book Awards for Excellence in Independent Publishing!!!**Awarded 2016 BOOK OF THE YEAR from Books Go Social!! "RIVETING FROM START TO FINISH!!" by Tom~~~In the tradition of HARRY POTTER AND TWILIGHT, comes a captivating fantasy tale that will have you on the edge of your seat and keep you reading late into the night as you go along on an unpredictable journey with the Occuli!!!Have you ever received shocking news that changes everything?Imagine being eighteen-year-old Remy Verbetta, and finding out that you are not 'human” and are not from this world.Remy’s entire life has been a lie. Another world is living and breathing beside our own, an alternate dimension. On her eighteenth birthday, Remy finds out that she is a member of an ancient and almost extinct race called the Occuli. Each Occuli has different magical powers, based solely on their eye color. This multiple award-winning, supernatural fantasy novel, follows Remy on a journey of self-discovery, magic, romance and betrayal, as she learns about her new powers and tries to figure out a way not only to survive, but also how to get back to her true home while saving the Occuli from extinction!
author: Christie M. Davis
